response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for us at $10,000. Considering its immense worth to you, I propose an offer of $9,500 to make this acquisition possible. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing our return and ensuring your satisfaction with the transaction. Should you decide to proceed, we can arrange for immediate delivery and provide all necessary support to ensure a smooth process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 9500}
